name: Drop Space
description:
DROP SPACE

This game was made in ~14hrs for Ludum Dare 42 [Theme: Running out of space]

To play: Click and swipe to make pairs of planets, and empty the space... before you Run out of space!

Thanks for playing. Be sure to let me know what you think:
Twitter

If you'd like to vote in the LD here's the link:

Ludum Dare Game Page
